description: Brenner Bolton has plans to go out with his best friend, but she sends her husband Cameron Foster instead. Brenner is meeting up with old friends and asks Cameron to pretend to be his boyfriend to avoid ridicule for being single. After their day out, the two return to Brenner’s hotel room where things heat up. Brenner decides to be a good friend and offers to take care of Cameron’s hot, straight cock. With a little convincing, Cameron fucks a load out of Brenner, finishing with a nice, steamy facial.
title: My Best Friend's Husband Part 1
